name: reYal
detailed_description:
A short puzzle game where you
play as you playing as you
to find out why.

Too experimental for more spoilers. I think you'll like the ending if you can find it.

Features

+ Rooms/Layers

+ Buttons
+ Doors and Keys
+ Implications

Accessibility

+ No dialog
- No subtitles
+ No color differentiation required
+ Mostly high contrast
+ No time limits to complete in-game tasks
+ Simple menu
- No instructions
- No alternative difficulty levels
- Only partial non-remappable controller support (Requires if used: 1 d-pad, 1 button)
- No remappable keyboard keys (Requires: wasd or arrow keys, enter or space or e, escape)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 SP1 or newer and compatible with full 32bit i386 support
  • Processor: 1 gHz, 2 cores
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Accelerated true OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 22050Hz, signed 16bit, stereo
